feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.29.1
entry.content:
This release improves the relay with better authentication messages. To ensure your system is working properly, you should upgrade your relay and management servers before upgrading your clients.

What's Changed

  • [client] Don't overwrite allowed IPs when updating the wg peer's endpoint address by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2578
  • [relay] Improve relay messages by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2574
  • [relay] change log levels by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2580
  • Remove pre-release step from workflow by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2583
  • [client] Update service package version by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2582

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.29.0...v0.29.1

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.29.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [management] Add GCM encryption and migrate legacy encrypted events by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2569
  • [misc] Update core github actions by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2584
  • Update Go version to 1.23 by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2588
  • [management] Add accessible peers endpoint by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2579
  • [client] fix: install.sh: avoid call of netbird executable after rpm-ostree installation by @M0Rf30 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2589
  • [client] Fix wg handshake checking by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2590
  • [misc] Support configurable max log size with var NB_LOG_MAX_SIZE_MB by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2592

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.29.1...v0.29.2

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.29.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [client] Ensure engine is stopped before starting it back by @hurricanehrndz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2565
  • [relay] Change heartbeat timeout by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2598
  • [client] Fix blocked net.Conn Close call by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2600
  • [management] Add command flag to set metrics port for signal and relay service, and update management port by @benniekiss in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2599
  • [client] Fix get management and signal state race condition by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2570
  • [management] fix legacy decrypting of empty values by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2595
  • [signal] Fix signal active peers metrics by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2591
  • [management] Add transaction to addPeer by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2469
  • [client] Fix leaked server connections by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2596
  • [client] Enforce permissions on Win by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2568
  • [relay] Add health check attempt threshold by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2609
  • [client] Fix race condition while read/write conn status in peer conn by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2607
  • [client] Cancel the context of wg watcher when the go routine exit by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2612

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.29.2...v0.29.3

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.29.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Do not block the msg receiving if the wg proxy does not operate by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2617
  • Exit from processConnResults after all tries by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2621

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/0.29.3...v0.29.4

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.30.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [management] Restrict accessible peers to user-owned peers for non-admins by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2618
  • [misc] Fix ip range posture check example in API doc by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2628
  • [client] Remove usage of custom dialer for localhost by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2639
  • [client] Fix error count formatting by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2641
  • [client] Anonymize relay address in status peers view by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2640
  • [management] Add get DB method to store by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2650
  • [client] Close the remote conn in proxy by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2626
  • [management] Remove redundant get account calls in GetAccountFromToken by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2615
  • [management] improve zitadel idp error response detail by decoding errors by @adasauce in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2634
  • [signal] add context to signal-dispatcher by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2662
  • [signal] Propagate metrics by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2668
  • [client] Fix ebpf close function by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2672
  • [misc] Specify goreleaser version and update to 2 by @M0Rf30 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2673
  • [management] Propagate metrics by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2667
  • Install sh alpine fixes by @simen64 in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2678
  • [relay-client] Fix Relay disconnection handling by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2680
  • [misc] Add log setting to Caddy container by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2684
  • [misc] Use the pkgs to get the latest version by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2682
  • [management, client] Add access control support to network routes by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2100
  • [client] Adjust relay worker log level and message by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2683
  • [signal] Move dummy signal message handling into dispatcher by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2686
  • [client] Refactor/iface pkg by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2646
  • [management] Update management base docker image by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2687
  • [management] Remove file store by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2689
  • [management] Refactor User JWT group sync by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2690
  • [management] Add AccountExists to AccountManager by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2694
  • [management] Fix account manager mock by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2695
  • [client] Check wginterface instead of engine ctx by @hurricanehrndz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2676

New Contributors

  • @adasauce made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2634
  • @simen64 made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/2678

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.29.4...v0.30.0
